results.title: Free school meals and other benefits | Hertfordshire County Council
results.snippet: Register for free school meals (FSM) for reception, year 1 and year 2. Check whether you're eligible for free school meals for year 3 and above.

results.title: Herts Card for those who receive free school meals | Hertfordshire ...
results.snippet: Your digital Herts Card gets you discounts on leisure facilities, things to do, respite activities and lots more.

results.title: Schools and education | Hertfordshire County Council
results.snippet: Schools and education in Hertfordshire including school admissions, term dates, free school meals, school transport and adult learning.

results.title: Children's services or schools - contact us | Hertfordshire County ...
results.snippet: Money advice, benefits and support to get a job · Adult social care leaflets ... Free school meals. Apply for free school meals online. Any questions, call ...

results.title: Starting school | Hertfordshire County Council
results.snippet: If you have a child starting school, find out key information here, from free school meals to school attendance.

results.title: Home to school transport | Hertfordshire County Council
results.snippet: Very few children can get free home to school transport. Spare seats scheme. Buy spare seats on buses or coaches that we run. SaverCard. Half fare bus travel ...

results.title: Help to manage the cost of living | Hertfordshire County Council
results.snippet: Childcare and free early education – find out how much free childcare you can get, how to claim it and where you can use it. Government help with childcare ...

results.title: Contact us | Hertfordshire County Council
results.snippet: Contact us. Children's services and schools. Including school admissions and transport, free school meals, fostering and adoption, and child protection.
